bill.summary: 8/5/1993--Introduced. Requires the President to obtain specific statutory authorization from the Congress under the War Powers Resolution prior to introducing U.S. armed forces into hostilities, or into situations where imminent involvement in hostilities is clearly indicated by the circumstances, in the former Yugoslavia.
